text: From a systems standpoint the registry key to disable the service should have been released first and then given enough time to announce and give those that don’t need the feature time to turn it off. Weeks would probably be enough. There are always exceptions and good customer service plays to the exceptions. Thanks, Job %241b2fe900%24518fbb00%24%40ccbox.com
